bioAsHtml: Nicola is a Developer Advocate at Atlassian. He writes and talks about git, development workflows, collaboration around code and is an all-round hacker. Prior to Atlassian he lead software teams, built crowd sourcing applications for geo-spatial data, worked on huge e-commerce deployments.

acceptedTalks.title: Dockerism at Atlassian: A million deaths

bio: Nicola is a Developer Advocate at Atlassian. He writes and talks about git, development workflows, collaboration around code and is an all-round hacker. Prior to Atlassian he lead software teams, built crowd sourcing applications for geo-spatial data, worked on huge e-commerce deployments.
